dict.acceptation: 摇摆，摆动；摆程，振幅；秋千；音律；
使旋转；使做曲线运动；挥舞；悬吊；
悬摆；迅速打击；侧转，转弯；轻快摇摆地走；

sent.orig: There are many commercial and open source swing libraries on market after years of development.
sent.trans: 许多商业或开源的Swing组件库在开发多年后都已经可以方便地获取了。

sent.orig: Swing provide very variety of standard components.
sent.trans: Swing提供了非常广泛的标准组件。

sent.orig: AWT and Swing were designed carefully in such a way to avoid platform incompatibility.
sent.trans: AWT和Swing都被小心地设计以保证平台兼容性。

sent.orig: This method is thread safe, although most Swing methods are not.
sent.trans: 这个方法是线程安全的，尽管大多数Swing方法都不是。

sent.orig: Swing, swing and swing, swing Him out far, far away.
sent.trans: 摇呀摇呀摇摇，把他往远远的地方推掉。
